title: Terry Pegula - Wikipedia
snippet: On June 23, 2025, it was announced that Pegula would divest ownership of the Knighthawks franchise. It was later announced on August 5, 2025 that the Seneca Nation of New York had purchased the team. In 2012, he won a bid for the development rights to the Webster Block on Buffalo's waterfront.

title: 'Small-market' Bills rewarding owner Terry Pegula with hefty return on investment
snippet: Roger Goodell, the NFL commissioner, talks with majority owner of the Buffalo Bills, Terry Pegula, during the Bills warm up before the Buffalo Bills divisional game against the Baltimore Ravens at Highmark Stadium in Orchard Park on Jan. 19, 2025.
